pkgmetadata.longdescription: Water Cloud Model (WCM) for the Simulation of Leaf Area Index (LAI) and Soil Moisture (SM) in Satellite Earth Observation Data // Retrieves the leaf area index (LAI) and soil moisture (SM) from synthetic aperture radar(SAR) for earth observation data using water cloud model (WCM) model inversion. The WCM algorithm attributed to Pervot et al. (1993)doi:10.1016/0034-4257(93)90053-Z.
